product_name: The North Face Stormy Trail Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With your heart pumping and the sweat dripping down your face, The North Face Stormy Trail jacket lets you grind out the miles under the gloomiest of skies. Nylon shell features FlashDry(TM) technology, dramatically improving dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Waterproof, breathable laminate keeps you dry in foul weather. Droptail hem cinches to prevent riding up. Zip chest pocket holds keys, ID and a gel. Reflective elements help keep you visible. The North Face Stormy Trail jacket stows easily-perfect, packable emergency weather protection. Closeout.
short_description: With your heart pumping and the sweat dripping down your face, The North Face Stormy Trail jacket lets you grind out the miles under the gloomiest of skies.
